sen.j: 三条通り（さんじょうどおり）は、奈良県奈良市にある街路。
sen.e: Sanjo-dori Street is a road in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
Sanjo-dori Street is a road in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
Sanjo-dori Street is a road in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 県庁所在地である奈良市中心市街地を、東西に貫く目抜き通りである。
sen.e: It is a boulevard running through the heart of Nara City, the prefectural seat of government, in the east-west direction.
It is a boulevard running through the heart of Nara City, the prefectural seat of government, in the east-west direction.
It is a boulevard running through the heart of Nara City, the prefectural seat of government, in the east-west direction.
Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 春日大社一の鳥居から奈良市・生駒市を経て、生駒山暗峠へ至る。
sen.e: Starting at the torii gate of Kasuga-taisha Shrine, the road extends into Ikoma City (Nara Prefecture) and to Kuragari-toge Pass in Mt. Ikoma.
Starting at the torii gate of Kasuga-taisha Shrine, the road extends into Ikoma City (Nara Prefecture) and to Kuragari-toge Pass in Mt. Ikoma.
Starting at the torii gate of Kasuga-taisha Shrine, the road extends into Ikoma City (Nara Prefecture) and to Kuragari-toge Pass in Mt. Ikoma.

sen.j: 通常はJR奈良駅より東側を云い、各種店舗や飲食店・ホテル・金融機関・コンビニなどが軒を並べ、大勢の通行人で賑わう。
sen.e: More commonly, the name refers to the road east of JR Nara Station. The road is lined with retail shops, restaurants, hotels, banks, convenience stores and other establishments and draws a large number of visitors.

More commonly, the name refers to the road east of JR Nara Station; the road is lined with retail shops, restaurants, hotels, banks, convenience stores and other establishments and draws a large number of visitors.
sen.cmt: 分割は不要と考え、一文に訂正しました。
sen.e: More commonly, the name refers to the road east of JR Nara Station; the road is lined with retail shops, restaurants, hotels, banks, convenience stores and other establishments and draws a large number of visitors.

sen.j: 歴史ある地元向け老舗店と観光客向けの土産店などが混在するが、近年は全国チェーンのレストラン、カフェ等も増えている。
sen.e: Alongside historic, prestigious retailers serving local customers and gift shops for tourists, the number of nationally franchise restaurants and cafes has grown in recent years.
Alongside historic, prestigious retailers serving local customers and gift shops for tourists, the number of nationally franchise restaurants and cafes has grown in recent years.
Alongside historic, prestigious retailers serving local customers and gift shops for tourists, the number of nationally franchise restaurants and cafes has grown in recent years.

sen.j: 奈良市街地の中心であるが、道路幅は狭い（8m）ため16mに拡張が計画されている。
sen.e: Though located in central Nara City, the street is only 8 meters wide. Plan is under way to widen it to 16 meters.
Though located in central Nara City, the street is only 8 meters wide, plan is under way to widen it to 16 meters.
sen.cmt: 分割は不要と考え、一文に訂正しました。
sen.e: Though located in central Nara City, the street is only 8 meters wide, plan is under way to widen it to 16 meters.

sen.j: 車道は1車線のみで東向きの一方通行であり休日は歩行者天国となる。
sen.e: It is a one-lane road, car traffic allowed only in the eastward direction. The street is turned into a pedestrians' paradise on holidays.
It is a one-lane road, car traffic allowed only in the eastward direction, and the street is turned into a pedestrians' paradise on holidays.
sen.cmt: 分割は不要と考え、一文に訂正しました。
sen.e: It is a one-lane road, car traffic allowed only in the eastward direction, and the street is turned into a pedestrians' paradise on holidays.

sen.j: また、三条栄町交差点以西は「三条菅原線」として大宮通り線整備と同時に拡幅され、片側2車線の道路になる見通し。
sen.e: The road west of the Sanjo-Sakaecho intersection is expected to be widened as Sanjo Sugawara Line, together with improvement of the Omiya-dori Line, and to become a road with two lanes on each side.
sen.cmt: 三条栄町交差点: Sanjo-Sakaecho intersection
sen.e: The road west of the Sanjo Sakae-cho intersection is expected to be widened as Sanjo Sugawara Line, together with improvement of the Omiya-dori Line, and to become a road with two lanes on each side.
sen.cmt: ハイフン補足しました。
sen.e: The road west of the Sanjo Sakae-cho intersection is expected to be widened as Sanjo Sugawara Line, together with improvement of the Omiya-dori Line, and to become a road with two lanes on each side.

sen.j: 国道24号奈良バイパス供用開始まではこの道が国道24号であった。
sen.e: This street was part of National Route 24 until the opening of Nara Bypass on National Route 24.
This street was part of National Route 24 until the opening of Nara Bypass on National Route 24.
This street was part of National Route 24 until the opening of Nara Bypass on National Route 24.

sen.j: バサラ祭りや三枝祭・春日若宮おん祭などの行事でパレードのメインルートとして利用される。
sen.e: The street serves as the main route for parades in Basara-matsuri Festival, Saigusa-matsuri Festival and Kasuga Wakamiya Onmatsuri Festival.
The street serves as the main route for parades in Basara-matsuri Festival, Saigusa-matsuri Festival and Kasuga Wakamiya Onmatsuri Festival.
The street serves as the main route for parades in Basara-matsuri Festival, Saigusa-matsuri Festival and Kasuga Wakamiya Onmatsuri Festival.

sen.j: 名称は平城京の坊条制における三条大路に由来する。
sen.e: The street name derives from Sanjo-oji Street under the Bojosei street planning scheme for Heijo-kyo.
The street name derives from Sanjo-oji Street under the Bojosei street planning scheme for Heijo-kyo.
The street name derives from Sanjo-oji Street under the Bojosei street planning scheme for Heijo-kyo.

sen.j: 近鉄奈良駅周辺では、やすらぎの道・小西さくら通り商店街・東向商店街・餅飯殿通りなどと交差する。
sen.e: In the area close to Kinki Nara Station, it intersects with Yasuragino-michi Street, Konishi Sakuradori Shopping Street, Higashimukai Shopping Street and Mochiidono-dori Street.
sen.cmt: やすらぎの道: Yasuragino-michi Street
sen.e: In the area close to Nara Station of Kintetsu line, it intersects with Yasuragino-michi Street, Konishi Sakuradori Shopping Street, Higashimukai Shopping Street and Mochiidono-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Nara Station of Kintetsu lineに訂正しました。
sen.e: In the area close to Nara Station of Kintetsu line, it intersects with Yasuragino-michi Street, Konishi Sakuradori Shopping Street, Higashimukai Shopping Street and Mochiidono-dori Street.

sen.j: やすらぎの道や餅飯殿通りを南に下ると、ならまちが広がる。
sen.e: Naramichi is located south of Yasuragino-michi Street and Mochiidono-dori Street.
Naramichi is located south of Yasuragino-michi Street and Mochiidono-dori Street.
Naramichi is located south of Yasuragino-michi Street and Mochiidono-dori Street.

sen.j: やすらぎの道を北へ向かうと奈良きたまちや鴻池運動公園・奈良テレビ放送・奈良ドリームランドなどへ至る。
sen.e: To the north along Yasuragino-chi Street are Nara Kitamachi, Konoike Athletic Park, Nara Television and Nara-Dreamland.
To the north along Yasuragino-chi Street are Nara Kitamachi, Konoike Athletic Park, Nara Television and Nara-Dreamland.
To the north along Yasuragino-chi Street are Nara Kitamachi, Konoike Athletic Park, Nara Television and Nara-Dreamland.

sen.j: 好天の日は両側のビルの合間に聳える春日山原始林の緑が美しい。
sen.e: On a clear day, the beautiful greenery of Kasugayama Primeval Forest can be seen between the buildings on both sides of the street.
On a clear day, the beautiful greenery of Kasugayama Primeval Forest can be seen between the buildings on both sides of the street.
On a clear day, the beautiful greenery of Kasugayama Primeval Forest can be seen between the buildings on both sides of the street.
